txt.en: 'Listen, little one. You are brave to come here and help us. Maybe if you are fighting Orcs and flying bat-women anyway, you will do us another service? We eat the fruits of the earth -- root vegetables -- that grow in the gorges to the east, the old little people call it Duvairë. But now the Orcs and flying bat-women make it hard for us to gather them. If you are there killing, maybe you can bring us some vegetables, too?'
'Very good! These will make a good stew. You have our thanks, little one.'
'We want the root vegetables that grow to the east in the Duvairë.'
The Earth-kin are fond of a certain kind of tuber that grows in the gorges in the east side of Ram Dúath in the Duvairë -- the places now frequented by the Orkish-army and merrevail.
Bring the root vegetables back to Eetu at Lehmä-koti
The root vegetables grow in the gorges on the east side of Ram Dúath in the Duvairë.\n\nEetu has asked you to gather vegetables for the Earth-kin of the Suuri-lehmä.
